foreignKeyAttribute.name: managingPartner

constantValues: Unique identifier for Account associated with Contact.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier for Account associated with Contact.

members.name: disableWebTracking

constantValues: Indicates that the contact has opted out of web tracking.

members.description: Indicates that the contact has opted out of web tracking.

members.name: isMinor

constantValues: Indicates that the contact is considered a minor in their jurisdiction.

members.description: Indicates that the contact is considered a minor in their jurisdiction.

members.name: isMinorWithParentalConsent

constantValues: Indicates that the contact is considered a minor in their jurisdiction and has parental consent.

members.description: Indicates that the contact is considered a minor in their jurisdiction and has parental consent.

members.name: portalTermsAgreementDate

constantValues: Indicates the date and time that the person agreed to the portal terms and conditions.

members.description: Indicates the date and time that the person agreed to the portal terms and conditions.

members.name: accessFailedCount

constantValues: Shows the current count of failed password attempts for the contact.

members.description: Shows the current count of failed password attempts for the contact.

members.name: emailConfirmed

constantValues: Determines if the email is confirmed by the contact.

members.description: Determines if the email is confirmed by the contact.

members.name: lastSuccessfulLogin

constantValues: Indicates the last date and time the user successfully signed in to a portal.

members.description: Indicates the last date and time the user successfully signed in to a portal.

members.name: localLoginDisabled

constantValues: Indicates that the contact can no longer sign in to the portal using the local account.

members.description: Indicates that the contact can no longer sign in to the portal using the local account.

members.name: lockoutEnabled

constantValues: Determines if this contact will track failed access attempts and become locked after too many failed attempts. To prevent the contact from becoming locked, you can disable this setting.

members.description: Determines if this contact will track failed access attempts and become locked after too many failed attempts. To prevent the contact from becoming locked, you can disable this setting.

members.name: lockoutEndDate

constantValues: Shows the moment in time when the locked contact becomes unlocked again.

members.description: Shows the moment in time when the locked contact becomes unlocked again.

members.name: loginEnabled

constantValues: Determines if web authentication is enabled for the contact.

members.description: Determines if web authentication is enabled for the contact.

members.name: mobilePhoneConfirmed

constantValues: Determines if the phone number is confirmed by the contact.

members.description: Determines if the phone number is confirmed by the contact.

members.name: securityStamp

constantValues: A token used to manage the web authentication session.

members.description: A token used to manage the web authentication session.

members.name: twoFactorEnabled

constantValues: Determines if two-factor authentication is enabled for the contact.

members.description: Determines if two-factor authentication is enabled for the contact.

members.name: userName

constantValues: Shows the user identity for local web authentication.

members.description: Shows the user identity for local web authentication.
